aka: Even in the best families, the restoration
this_title: Hasta en las mejores familias, la restauración
trans_title: Even in the best families, the restoration
introduction: A sarcastic comedy set in Chile upon the return to democracy after the long dictatorship run by Augusto Pinochet. A film originally shot in 1990, it was banned by Chilean censorship after a short release in 1994. Newly restored and including all the censored footage, the film is a brand new version based on the ironic original screenplay.
chinese_title: Hasta en las mejores familias, la restauración
